content:
The refactor of CartesianClosedAPI discussed in #PR reviews > #17554 : Basics of sifted categories (RFC!) and #mathlib4 > Cartesian closed Monoidal categories. is now ready at #17766!

Coming along with the refactor, I feel like docs#CategoryTheory.monoidalOfHasFiniteProducts should be marked as deprecated, in favor of docs#CategoryTheory.ChosenFiniteProducts.ofFiniteProducts, which then provides a monoidal structure , but I prefer to ask maintainerâ€™s opinion before doing that.
